messages.content:
can you shorten, keep the tone and make this simpler? 
"Also, I wanted to share that my dates / times are confirmed. Itâ€™ll be a short trip in Michigan, although Iâ€™d love to see you if at all possible. I have Jan 8th late afternoon/evening, Jan 9 all day, and Jan 10 morning and afternoon. If it doesnâ€™t work this time, Iâ€™d love to get on a call someday. Iâ€™ve freed myself up from Bloom work since the Baby was born and have taken a much needed long break. Haha, I am beginning to get a bit antsy though and Iâ€™d love to share some of the opportunities Iâ€™ve been thinking about and to see if you have any others ðŸ™‚ "

"I've confirmed my dates for a brief Michigan visit. Hoping to catch up, I'm free Jan 8th evening, Jan 9th all day, and Jan 10th until afternoon. If not, let's chat soon. Since the baby, I've paused from Bloom and am now eager to discuss new opportunities!"
i dont want to just say opportunities because i want to indicate i have my own opportunities to share/explore with him

"I've confirmed my short Michigan trip and would love to meet. I'm available Jan 8th evening, Jan 9th all day, and Jan 10th until afternoon. If we can't meet, let's have a call. Post-baby, I've taken a break from Bloom but am now excited to discuss and explore some potential ventures I've been considering!"

can you streamline this message keeping the quirky tone?
Hey Eric and Christy!
I am heading out to an event near San Jose and I chose to fly in to SFO on January 11th. I was hoping it may be available to high five me sometime between 10am and 1pm (2pm is pushing it yet possible).
Dawn Danby is available and we're thinking of meeting here:Projecto Diaz Coffee on Mandela/20th1416 20th St Oakland CA

Eric, I saw Channing Copper is nearby in the East Bay. If you want I could swing by the office if you're there :) - Also, if your office has a coffee maker, perhaps Dawn and I can swing by there and say hi. Don't want to interrupt too much, let me know what works.
Christy, I'm not sure what your plan is, although if I'm in the East Bay I can easily get on some Lyfts and swing by to see all three of yall wherever you may be.Â 
Many hugs!BGPS, Sorry I can't bring a baby. This photo will have to suffice for now:

"Hey Eric and Christy,

Zooming into SFO on Jan 11th for a San Jose shindig! Got a slot for high-fives at SFO between 10am-1pm (2pm's a stretch but doable). Dawn's in, and we're eyeing Projecto Diaz Coffee in Oakland for a catch-up.

Eric, if you're orbiting the East Bay, I might pop over. If your office is brewing some joe, Dawn and I could drop in for a quick hello. Just buzz me what works.

Christy, if you're around, I'm game for some Lyft-hopping to rendezvous with the trio. 

Group hug!
BG

P.S. No baby in tow, but here's a pic to tide you over!"
yuk, keep it like the original just make it more streamlined and less long

"Hey Eric and Christy,

Heading to San Jose and landing at SFO on Jan 11th. Hoping to high five between 10am-1pm (maybe 2pm). Dawn and I plan to meet at Projecto Diaz Coffee, Oakland.

Eric, if you're in East Bay, maybe I'll swing by your office for a quick hello. Christy, I can Lyft around to catch up with you too.

Many hugs!
BG

P.S. No baby this time, just this photo!"
less short, keep some of the idea about meeting at channging copper

"Hey Eric and Christy,

I'm jetting into SFO on Jan 11th for a San Jose event and hoping to catch you between 10am-1pm, 2pm at the latest. Dawn's joining, and we're thinking of grabbing coffee at Projecto Diaz in Oakland.

Eric, I heard Channing Copper's close by. I could swing by your office if you're there - a quick hello and a coffee if you've got it. Christy, if you're in the area, I'm ready to hop in some Lyfts to see you too!

Many hugs!
BG

P.S. Sorry, no baby this trip, but here's a cute photo to make up for it!"
